channel.title: Maitre D on Chef Frank's Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Maitre D on Chef Frank's Recipes

item.title: Scallops Newburg With Buttery Cream Sauce
item.description: Make scallops newburg with large Sea Scallops and a buttery cream sauce. Then place over rice and serve with Broccoli and cheese and a Salad. A nice mellow white wine compliments this meal. Scallops Newburg Ingredients 2 lbs scallops (large size is better) 1/4 c small diced onion 1/4 c small diced celery 2 oz. maitre d’ butter 1/2 c roux 3 c milk 1/2 tsp Chef Frank’s Seasoning Scallops Newburg Directions Prepare cream sauce by heating milk and paprika over medium heat in double boiler, or carefully in sauce pan.
